author: sccomer
msg: fix ETCH-6: if free pool exceeds maximum number of threads the exception thrown will kill the connection.
also rearrange code in StubBase sessionMessage to enable optimization of NONE case.

author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-321: The iterator returned by AbstractHierachicalConfiguration.getKeys(String prefix) now contains the prefix if this key is contained in the configuration. Ported the fix from trunk to configuration2 branch.
